title: Black susano
author: Black susano
content: I have posed down to study the ANTs and this makes a lot of sense, the ant can never make excuses and continue with the business of the day and getting it done, and also they do their work and sometimes they do not need Captain they are also disciplined and self-starters. If I could understand them better they have taught us the necessary to plan and look ahead for the future, more I can say about them is that they always work as a team and also store their nourishment during the season of abundance so that they can have a large portion in the time of scarcity they also have planned experience strategies of how to rest and to prevent burnout. what are your thoughts on this......  Do you think that people in the nation will be able to live their lifestyle like this??

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on June 26, 2023, 10:17:17 PMI have posed down to study the ANTs and this makes a lot of sense, the ant can never make excuses and continue with the business of the day and getting it done, and also they do their work and sometimes they do not need Captain they are also disciplined and self-starters. If I could understand them better they have taught us the necessary to plan and look ahead for the future, more I can say about them is that they always work as a team and also store their nourishment during the season of abundance so that they can have a large portion in the time of scarcity they also have planned experience strategies of how to rest and to prevent burnout. what are your thoughts on this......  Do you think that people in the nation will be able to live their lifestyle like this??I think it is a little bit out of place to compare an ant colony to a human society, considering the level of awareness we have in comparison to them.I do not want to take credit out of them, though. it is true they can be very organized, strong and hard working but they are insects and their society lacks of many of the complex part which ours have...

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: NoWe complex animalAnts are programmed that way They listen to the QueenWe thinkWe greedy We not perfectThe only way this can happen is through mass brainwashingIn all, with the small semblance of free will we haveWe can never b that organize

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on June 26, 2023, 10:17:17 PMI have posed down to study the ANTs and this makes a lot of sense, the ant can never make excuses and continue with the business of the day and getting it done, and also they do their work and sometimes they do not need Captain they are also disciplined and self-starters. If I could understand them better they have taught us the necessary to plan and look ahead for the future, more I can say about them is that they always work as a team and also store their nourishment during the season of abundance so that they can have a large portion in the time of scarcity they also have planned experience strategies of how to rest and to prevent burnout. what are your thoughts on this......  Do you think that people in the nation will be able to live their lifestyle like this??In the rural areas, it is common to see soldiers and house ants and I have also observed them. Humans are not ants but we can learn a few things from the way they behave. Even the Holy Bible encouraged us to go to the ants and learn from themAnts are not selfish because they inform others if they see any food item. They come together and gather the food and store it. Humans will hide their source of income and will want only them to be rich. Some will even be pleased to see others suffer even when they have means of making them earn some money.Ants are team players because they work with a unity of purpose. It is rare to see ants fighting each other because they are together in peace and unity. Humans are always disagreeing and in conflict with each other. There are people you can never work with because they are not team players.Ants are always focused. If they want to achieve a goal they will pursue it till the end. They are not easily distracted by circumstances. Even if they are distracted after some time they will continue with the task. Even if you kill some, others will just carry the dead and the task will continue.Ants are determined and persistent: Ants will always put their problems aside and continue their task. If you destroy their habitation, after a little time they come together organize, and rebuild the home.Ants are good planners. They gather in the dry season so that they can use it in the rainy season when it will be difficult for them to move around to get food. Some humans are wasters and don't have plans for the future.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Proverbs 6 vs 6 Go to the ant, thou sluggard, Consider her ways, and be wise. 7.which having no guide, overseer or ruler, 8.provideth her meat in the summer,and gathered her food in the harvest. these are the verses God in the holy Bible advised we see if we want to fight poverty. Ant is the only thing God described as wise. Not even Human being, God has given everything for Human to enjoy, he uses the Ant to encourages hard work, and planning. the Ant has no ruler, but they work as team to achieve everything, with love and trust. This implies that God never wanted us to give excuses over the ruler of the world, regardless of their evil plans, if we work in love and honesty would all survived and never feel the evil plan of the leaders.The Ant are good planner, the practice food security in their kingdom. they save food doing the summer to prepare for the raining season. as human we must learn how to save money no matter how little it might be.the ant is my master, that's why i don't kill them.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on June 26, 2023, 10:17:17 PMDo you think that people in the nation will be able to live their lifestyle like this??You studied the ants from the outside and not from the inside.  You will never really know what it means to live like an ant because you are not an ant. Normal animal biology in college will teach you that the ants are highly organized when compared to some other animals, they have workers, soldiers and the queen who reproduces, they all have their place. You cannot compare the level of organisation of ants with the level of organisation of humans who are at the highest level of organisation. The ants have a way of life, so also do humans have a way of life with more complex organisation.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on June 26, 2023, 10:17:17 PMI have posed down to study the ANTs and this makes a lot of sense, the ant can never make excuses and continue with the business of the day and getting it done, and also they do their work and sometimes they do not need Captain they are also disciplined and self-starters. If I could understand them better they have taught us the necessary to plan and look ahead for the future, more I can say about them is that they always work as a team and also store their nourishment during the season of abundance so that they can have a large portion in the time of scarcity they also have planned experience strategies of how to rest and to prevent burnout. what are your thoughts on this......  Do you think that people in the nation will be able to live their lifestyle like thisIf there's one thing to ever learn about the ant is to know about their coordination, formation and how they lived together in a colony, they are very supportive, they work together and have the best organization in terms of division of labor, but why are we so called human can't make use of the best ability we have in possession to make life more beautiful and peaceful for our living despite we are called the higher animals.

comments.author: Black susano
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on June 27, 2023, 03:06:10 PMQuote from: Black susano on June 26, 2023, 10:17:17 PMDo you think that people in the nation will be able to live their lifestyle like this??You studied the ants from the outside and not from the inside.  You will never really know what it means to live like an ant because you are not an ant. Normal animal biology in college will teach you that the ants are highly organized when compared to some other animals, they have workers, soldiers and the queen who reproduces, they all have their place. You cannot compare the level of organisation of ants with the level of organisation of humans who are at the highest level of organisation. The ants have a way of life, so also do humans have a way of life with more complex organisation.(op) you are getting this same things mix up yes we can live like the ant with no greed, no killing which others, and no hatred, don't you think the ant has set tremendous example for us to observe, just like you said I can not see them from the in side common sense make you to understand how there lifestyle are just like you said  I can not compare the animals to the human take note of this we are all animals just that we are more higher than them that all.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on June 27, 2023, 11:21:52 PMQuote from: Queentoshi on June 27, 2023, 03:06:10 PMQuote from: Black susano on June 26, 2023, 10:17:17 PMDo you think that people in the nation will be able to live their lifestyle like this??You studied the ants from the outside and not from the inside.  You will never really know what it means to live like an ant because you are not an ant. Normal animal biology in college will teach you that the ants are highly organized when compared to some other animals, they have workers, soldiers and the queen who reproduces, they all have their place. You cannot compare the level of organisation of ants with the level of organisation of humans who are at the highest level of organisation. The ants have a way of life, so also do humans have a way of life with more complex organisation.(op) you are getting this same things mix up yes we can live like the ant with no greed, no killing which others, and no hatred, don't you think the ant has set tremendous example for us to observe, just like you said I can not see them from the in side common sense make you to understand how there lifestyle are just like you said  I can not compare the animals to the human take note of this we are all animals just that we are more higher than them that all. Op if  understand you, what you implies is that, as human being we ought to be more organized as the animal with the higher brain. bur we are not as organized as the Ant, which i agree with you, no doubt we think more than the Ant and any other animals, but when it comes to the Ant, there are special wisdom we human being have to learn from their ways of living and planning, just as God said, we should go to the Ant to learn if we want to be wise,(proverbs6v6) God knows why he said we should go to the ant to learn how to be wise, because he created everything with special gift and importance.the Ant brain are always thinking about togetherness and cooperation, while the human brain are full of greed and division, now one cares about the good of the society, its just individuals want and needs. At the end those needs are unsatisfiable, this is where the Ant brain is higher than human, they share everything little things they got without any ruler, but human with rulers are still struggling to work in oneness.
